lagrange.test.collision

Class Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.test.collision.Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Boundary, Boundary_Raster

    public class Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements Boundary_Raster
    Class for creating small 4-cell based boundaries for testing collision detections and reflections
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool
